not exactly.translation[0].definitions[0: used as a reply to show that what someone has said is not completely correct or true
‘You hate Lee, don’t you?’ ‘Not exactly. I just think he’s a bit annoying, that’s all.’
not exactly.translation[0].definitions[1: used to show that you mean the complete opposite, either humorously, or when you are annoyed
I wouldn’t bother asking Dave – he’s not exactly Einstein  (=he is stupid).
